pages.title: Depth Helmet
pages.text: Armor made out of $(l:e_item_strongest_diamond)Strongest Diamonds/el is even better than the one made from $(l:e_item_deep_crystal)Deep Crystals/el. While the $(l:e_item_deep_crystal_armor)Deep Crystal Armor/el protects you pretty good from harm, the Depth Helmet allows the wearer to see in the dark, breathe under water and negate all damage the player receives at the cost of some $(l:e_mana_player_mana)Mana/el instead of durability.
